function.name: real
function.short: Real part of a complex quaternion

long.para: real(X) returns the real part of a complex quaternion.
The concept of the real part of a quaternion should not be confused with the scalar part (returned by the function scalar or s).

examples.precode:
>> q = complex(quaternion(1,2,3,4), quaternion(5,6,7,8))
q = (1+5i) + (2+6i) * I + (3+7i) * J + (4+8i) * K
>> imag(q)
ans = 5 + 6 * I + 7 * J + 8 * K
>> real(q)
ans = 1 + 2 * I + 3 * J + 4 * K

references.reference: Ward, J. P., "Quaternions and Cayley numbers", Kluwer, 1997.
